name: Grape Governance Token
description: A governance token that will be launched on Grapeâ€™s smart contract engine that will be used to create proposals and vote on the future of Grape (GRP) Grape DAO- From the GRP total supply, 10% or 1 million coins will be distributed to a separate fund which will be fully controlled by Grape DAO through GGT. At the initial rate, early holders will influence where $23,000,000 should be spent. DAO will be able to vote on any proposals that decide how the ecosystem should be developed and which projects that launch on Grape should be funded. Those votings will be exclusive for GGT holders
